00047  public static function GetSalt() {
00048   return php_uname('n');
00049  }
00050  
00058  public static function GetStatus() {
00059   // this software is free
00060   return "Active";
00061   
00062   $s = CMLicense::$LicenseName . " " . CMLicense::$Expire . " " . CMLicense::GetSalt();
00063   if(sha1($s) !== CMLicense::$ProtectionCode)
00064    return "Invalid";
00065    
00066   if(time() < CMLicense::$Expire)
00067    return "Active";
00068    
00069   return "Expired";
00070  }
00071  
00081  public static function CheckLicense() {
00082   // this software is free
00083   return true;
00084   
00085   if(CMLicense::$Expire < time())
00086    die("Your license has expired");
00087    
00088   $s = CMLicense::$LicenseName . " " . CMLicense::$Expire . " " . CMLicense::GetSalt();
00089   if(sha1($s) !== CMLicense::$ProtectionCode)
00090    die("Your license is invalid");
00091  }
00092  
00096  public function __toString() {
00097   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00098  }
